WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 26 DEC
   BY M/V KOMMANDOR IONA WITH SUBMERSIBLE
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   21-18S 039-58W, 21-18S 039-55W,
   21-09S 039-55W, 21-09S 040-00W,
   21-11S 040-00W, 21-11S 039-58W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3899/18.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 27 DEC 18.
